view

Class GameFieldPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GameFieldPrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, IGameFieldPrinter

    class GameFieldPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameFieldPrinter
    This method print always the current game field when it was changed. Furthermore he printed for each game state a special test. So that the users know what they can do.
    Author:
    Bj√∂rn Hullmann
